data.name: NetworkError
data.value: Unable to connect to the network.

data.name: SaveFailed
data.value: Failed to save data. Please try again.

data.name: reason_for_substitution
data.value: Reason for substitution/casualty of the original household

data.name: block_3_heading
data.value: Block 3: Demographic particulars of the household
data.comment: Block 3: Demographic particulars of the household

data.name: entry
data.value: if entry in col. 4 ≥18, whether has any driving license as on the date of survey?

data.name: forenrty
data.value: for entry≥ 6 in col. 4 and code 4 in col. 8, whether pursuing basic course through correspondence/ distance learning (yes-1, no-2)
data.comment: for entry≥ 6 in col. 4 and code 4 in col. 8, whether pursuing basic course through correspondence/ distance learning (yes-1, no-2)

data.name: for_code
data.value: for code 1, 2 & 3 in col. 8, whether have at least one fixed place of work outside the premises of dwelling unit at a distance of 1 km or more (yes-1, no-2)
for code other than 9 in col. 8, whether having season ticket/pass/free pass for bus/rail as on the date of survey (yes-1, no-2)

data.name: if
data.value: if code 1 in col. 11, status of season tickets / pass for rail / bus (rail pass-1, bus pass-2, both–3)

data.name: worked
data.value: whether worked from home in the current status during last 30 days (yes – 1, no – 2)
data.comment: whether worked from home in the current status during last 30 days (yes – 1, no – 2)

data.name: internet
data.value: if 1 in col., 13, whether used internet for such work (yes- 1, no- 2)
data.comment: if 1 in col., 13, whether used internet for such work (yes- 1, no- 2)

data.name: vehicles
data.value: whether the household possesses any of the following vehicles as on the date of survey for household use and number of such vehicles

data.name: survey
data.value: whether possesses as on the date of survey
data.comment: whether possesses as on the date of survey

data.name: commercial
data.value: whether the household possesses any of the following vehicles as on the date of survey for commercial use and number of such vehicles
data.comment: whether the household possesses any of the following vehicles as on the date of survey for commercial use and number of such vehicles

data.name: whether
data.value: whether possesses as on the date of survey (yes-1, no-2)
data.comment: whether possesses as on the date of survey (yes-1, no-2)

data.name: Heavy
data.value: Heavy vehicles like lorry, truck etc
data.comment: Heavy vehicles like lorry, truck etc

data.name: Block6_1
data.value: Block 6.1: Details of trips to and from fixed workplace that are of usual nature for persons of age of 15 years and above having fixed place of work (i.e., code 1 in col. 10 of Block 3)
data.comment: Block 6.1: Details of trips to and from fixed workplace that are of usual nature for persons of age of 15 years and above having fixed place of work (i.e., code 1 in col. 10 of Block 3)

data.name: srl
data.value: srl. no. of hh member (as in col. 1, block 3)
data.comment: srl. no. of hh member (as in col. 1, block 3)

data.name: usual
data.value: usual time of leaving for work from origin (hh:mm in 24 hrs format)
data.comment: usual time of leaving for work from origin (hh:mm in 24 hrs format)

data.name: Average
data.value: Average time taken to reach workplace (in minutes)
data.comment: Average time taken to reach workplace (in minutes)

data.name: whether2
data.value: whether travelled to and from the fixed workplace on the travel-day prior to the date of survey (yes-1, no-2)
data.comment: whether travelled to and from the fixed workplace on the travel-day prior to the date of survey (yes-1, no-2)

data.name: if2
data.value: if code between ‘41’ to ‘81’ excluding ‘43’ in col. 5 secondary mode of transport (code)
data.comment: if code between ‘41’ to ‘81’ excluding ‘43’ in col. 5 secondary mode of transport (code)

data.name: time
data.value: usual time of leaving for destination from work (hh:mm in 24 hrs format)
data.comment: usual time of leaving for destination from work (hh:mm in 24 hrs format)

data.name: average3
data.value: average time taken to reach destination (in minutes)
data.comment: average time taken to reach destination (in minutes)

data.name: record
data.value: if code between ‘41’ to ‘81’ excluding ‘43’ in col.10, secondary mode of transport (code) [record code 09 if secondary mode of transport is not used]
data.comment: if code between ‘41’ to ‘81’ excluding ‘43’ in col.10, secondary mode of transport (code) [record code 09 if secondary mode of transport is not used]

data.name: Block6_2
data.value: Block 6.2: Details of within-day-trips in the travel day prior to the date of survey in the travel reference period (1 travel day) to and from fixed workplace for persons of age of 15 years and above having fixed place of work (i.e., code 1 in col. 10 of Block 3 and code 1 in col. 13 of Block 6.1)
data.comment: Block 6.2: Details of within-day-trips in the travel day prior to the date of survey in the travel reference period (1 travel day) to and from fixed workplace for persons of age of 15 years and above having fixed place of work (i.e., code 1 in col. 10 of Block 3 and code 1 in col. 13 of Block 6.1)

data.name: srlno
data.value: srl. no. of hh member (as in col. 1,block 3)
data.comment: srl. no. of hh member (as in col. 1,block 3)

data.name: ifcode
data.value: if code ‘2’ in both col. 3 and col.10 whether destination is home (yes-1, no-2)
data.comment: if code ‘2’ in both col. 3 and col.10 whether destination is home (yes-1, no-2)

data.name: distance2
data.value: distance from workplace to destination (kms) [for code 1 in col. 10 copy the entry in col. 15 to col. 16]
data.comment: distance from workplace to destination (kms) [for code 1 in col. 10 copy the entry in col. 15 to col. 16]

data.name: if3
data.value: if code 2 in col.10 and code 2 in col.11 purpose of trip from workplace to destination (code)
data.comment: if code 2 in col.10 and code 2 in col.11 purpose of trip from workplace to destination (code)

data.name: if4
data.value: if code ‘11’ in col.17 whether fixed place of work (yes-1, no-2)
data.comment: if code ‘11’ in col.17 whether fixed place of work (yes-1, no-2)

data.name: PIN1
data.value: PIN code (give code 9, if PIN is unknown)
data.comment: PIN code (give code 9, if PIN is unknown)

data.name: PIN9
data.value: PIN code (give code 9, if PIN is unknown)
data.comment: PIN code (give code 9, if PIN is unknown)

data.name: PIN6
data.value: PIN code (give code 9, if PIN is unknown)
data.comment: PIN code (give code 9, if PIN is unknown)

data.name: Block8
data.value: Block 8: Details of within-day-trips in the travel-day prior to the date of survey in the travel reference period (1 travel day) by household members of age 6 years and above for any purpose excluding work and attending educational institution (as already captured in Block 6.1 to Block 7)
data.comment: Block 8: Details of within-day-trips in the travel-day prior to the date of survey in the travel reference period (1 travel day) by household members of age 6 years and above for any purpose excluding work and attending educational institution (as already captured in Block 6.1 to Block 7)

data.name: no
data.value: no. of hh members in the trip
data.comment: no. of hh members in the trip

data.name: hhmm
data.value: time of leaving for destination from origin (hh:mm in 24 hrs format)

data.name: average12
data.value: average time taken to reach the destination (in minutes)
data.comment: average time taken to reach the destination (in minutes)

data.name: PIN88
data.value: PIN code (give code 9, if PIN is unknown)
data.comment: PIN code (give code 9, if PIN is unknown)

data.name: PIN55
data.value: PIN code (give code 9, if PIN is unknown)
data.comment: PIN code (give code 9, if PIN is unknown)

data.name: Block81
data.value: Block 8.1: Purpose of the trip for each household member of age 6 years and above for within-day trips undertaken in the travel day prior to the date of survey (as recorded in Block 8)
data.comment: Block 8.1: Purpose of the trip for each household member of age 6 years and above for within-day trips undertaken in the travel day prior to the date of survey (as recorded in Block 8)

data.name: srl4
data.value: srl. no. of trip (as in col. 1 block 8)

data.name: srl8
data.value: srl. no. of hh member who was in that trip (as in col. 1, block 3)

data.name: Block91
data.value: Block 9.1: Details of overnight trips by purpose undertaken by the household members during all the travel-days in the travel reference period (28 travel days) (to be filled for each trips in Block 9, Col. 1)
data.comment: Block 9.1: Details of overnight trips by purpose undertaken by the household members during all the travel-days in the travel reference period (28 travel days) (to be filled for each trips in Block 9, Col. 1)

data.name: Serial
data.value: Serial No. of trip (as in col. 1, block 9) (auto)
data.comment: Serial No. of trip (as in col. 1, block 9) (auto)

data.name: Class66
data.value: Class of Travel (code) (if code ‘61’ in row 5)
data.comment: Class of Travel (code) (if code ‘61’ in row 5)

data.name: Code99
data.value: Code or Name of Airport / Railway Station
data.comment: Code or Name of Airport / Railway Station

data.name: Block52
data.value: Block 5.2: Details of within-day-trips in a travel day closest to the date of survey in the travel reference period (90 travel days) to and from educational institution for persons of age of 6 years and above who are attending basic course in-person (i.e., with code 04 in col. 8 of Block 3 and code 2 in col. 9 of Block 3 and code 1 in col. 12 of Block 5.1)
data.comment: Block 5.2: Details of within-day-trips in a travel day closest to the date of survey in the travel reference period (90 travel days) to and from educational institution for persons of age of 6 years and above who are attending basic course in-person (i.e., with code 04 in col. 8 of Block 3 and code 2 in col. 9 of Block 3 and code 1 in col. 12 of Block 5.1)

data.name: 5_1_heading
data.value: Block 5.1: Details of usual trips to and from educational institution (pertaining to basic course) for persons of age of 6 years and above who are attending basic course in-person (i.e., with code 4 in col. 8 of Block 3 and code 2 in col. 9 of Block 3)
data.comment: Block 5.1: Details of usual trips to and from educational institution (pertaining to basic course) for persons of age of 6 years and above who are attending basic course in-person (i.e., with code 4 in col. 8 of Block 3 and code 2 in col. 9 of Block 3)

data.name: 5_1_col_2
data.value: usual time of leaving for educational institution from origin
data.comment: usual time of leaving for educational institution from origin

data.name: 4_1_col_1
data.value: Household’s last month consumption expenditure (in Rs.)
data.comment: Household’s last month consumption expenditure (in Rs.)

data.name: block5_head
data.value: Block 5.1: Details of usual trips to and from educational institution (pertaining to basic course) for persons of age of 6 years and above who are attending basic course in-person (i.e., with code 4 in col. 8 of Block 3 and code 2 in col. 9 of Block 3)

data.name: block5_srl
data.value: srl. no. of hh member(as in col. 1, block 3)

data.name: block5_usual
data.value: usual time of leaving for educational institution from origin(hh:mm in 24 hrs format)
data.comment: usual time of leaving for educational institution from origin

data.name: block5_average
data.value: average time taken to reach educational institution (in minutes)
data.comment: average time taken to reach educational institution (in minutes)

data.name: block5_if
data.value: if code between ‘41’ to ‘81’ excluding ‘43’ in col. 5 secondary mode of transport (code)
data.comment: if code between ‘41’ to ‘81’ excluding ‘43’ in col. 5

data.name: block5_whether
data.value: whether travelled to and from educational institution on at least one travel day during the travel reference period of last 90 travel days(yes-1, no-2)
data.comment: whether travelled to and from educational institution on at least one travel day during the travel reference period of last 90 travel days

data.name: block5_online
data.value: online attendance at educational institution from home (number of days in last 7 days prior to the travel day)
data.comment: online attendance at educational institution from home (number of days in last 7 days prior to the travel day)

data.name: block5_leving
data.value: usual time of leaving for destination from educational institution
data.comment: usual time of leaving for destination from educational institution (hh:mm in 24 hrs format)

data.name: block5_reach
data.value: average time taken to reach destination (in minutes)
data.comment: average time taken to reach destination (in minutes)

data.name: block5_11
data.value: if code between ‘41’ to ‘81’ excluding ‘43’ in col. 10,secondary mode of transport (code)[record code 09 if secondary mode of transport is not used]
data.comment: [record code 09 if secondary mode of transport is not used]

data.name: block_5_2_head
data.value: Block 5.2: Details of within-day-trips in a travel day closest to the date of survey in the travel reference period (90 travel days) to and from educational institution for persons of age of 6 years and above who are attending basic course in-person (i.e., with code 04 in col. 8 of Block 3 and code 2 in col. 9 of Block 3 and code 1 in col. 12 of Block 5.1)
data.comment: Block 5.2: Details of within-day-trips in a travel day closest to the date of survey in the travel reference period (90 travel days) to and from educational institution for persons of age of 6 years and above who are attending basic course in-person (i.e., with code 04 in col. 8 of Block 3 and code 2 in col. 9 of Block 3 and code 1 in col. 12 of Block 5.1)

data.name: block_5_2_1
data.value: srl. no. of hh member(as in col. 1,block 3)

data.name: block_5_2_4
data.value: PIN code (give code 9, if PIN is unknown)

data.name: block_5_2_7
data.value: PIN code (give code 9, if PIN is unknown)

data.name: block_5_2_11
data.value: if code 2 in both col.3 and col.10, destination is home (yes-1, no-2)

data.name: block_5_2_12_head
data.value: destination [for code 1 in col. 10 copy the entry in cols. 4 to col. 6 to cols. 12 to 14]

data.name: block_5_2_12
data.value: PIN code (give code 9, if PIN is unknown)

data.name: block_5_2_15
data.value: distance from origin to educational institution(kms)
data.comment: distance from origin to educational institution

data.name: block_5_2_16
data.value: distance from educational institution to destination (kms)[for code 1 in col. 10 copy the entry in col. 15 to col. 16 ]
data.comment: distance from educational institution to destination (kms)

data.name: block_5_2_17
data.value: if code 2 in col.10 and code 2 in col.11, purpose of trip from educational institution to destination
data.comment: if code 2 in col.10 and code 2 in col.11,

data.name: block7_head
data.value: Block 7: Details of within-day-trips in the travel day prior to the date of survey in the travel reference period (1 travel day) to non-fixed place of work for persons of age of 15 years and above* with code 1, 2 & 3 in col. 8 of Block 3
data.comment: Block 7: Details of within-day-trips in the travel day prior to the date of survey in the travel reference period (1 travel day) to non-fixed place of work for persons of age of 15 years and above* with code 1, 2 & 3 in col. 8 of Block 3

data.name: block7_1
data.value: srl. no. of hh member (as in col. 1, block 3)
data.comment: srl. no. of hh member (as in col. 1, block 3)

data.name: block7_2_11
data.value: time of leaving for destination from origin (hh:mm in 24 hrs format)

data.name: block7_2_12
data.value: average time taken to reach the destination (in minutes)

data.name: block7_3
data.value: PIN code (give code 9, if PIN is unknown)

data.name: block7_6
data.value: PIN code (give code 9, if PIN is unknown)

data.name: block9_head
data.value: Block 9: Details of overnight trips undertaken by the household members during all the travel-days in the travel reference period (28 travel days)

data.name: block9_head_1
data.value: no. of overnight trips performed by the household in the last 28 travel days prior to the date of survey (return trip will be counted as separate trip)

data.name: block9_2
data.value: no. of hh members in the trip

data.name: inminutes
data.value: total time taken to canvass the schedule by the team of enumerator (SE/JSO) (in minutes)
data.comment: total time taken to canvass the schedule by the team of enumerator (SE/JSO) (in minutes)

data.name: number
data.value: number of enumerator (SE/JSO) in the team who canvassed the schedule
data.comment: number of enumerator (SE/JSO) in the team who canvassed the schedule

data.name: whether23
data.value: Whether any remark has been entered by SE/JSO/SS/SSO In block 10/11 (yes -1, no -2)
data.comment: Whether any remark has been entered by SE/JSO/SS/SSO

data.name: Whether24
data.value: Whether any remark has been entered by SE/JSO/SS/SSO Elsewhere in the schedule (yes -1, no -2)
data.comment: Whether any remark has been entered by SE/JSO/SS/SSO Elsewhere in the schedule (yes -1, no -2)

data.name: Mobile6
data.value: Mobile number of informant/any other household member who can be contacted
data.comment: Mobile number of informant/any other household member who can be contacted

data.name: Landline
data.value: Landline number of the household, if any (Start with STD code)
data.comment: Landline number of the household, if any (Start with STD code)

data.name: Response
data.value: Response code of the informant as assessed by SE/JSO
data.comment: Response code of the informant as assessed by SE/JSO
